contributors.name: Chanwoo Lee
contributors.bio: Leading research in personal AI systems and human-AI interaction. Currently a Visiting Lecturer at Imperial College London.

contributors.name: Saetbyeol Leeyouk
contributors.bio: Critical Technologist bridging social issues, AI engineering, and HCI research. As a media artist and system developer, she builds scalable systems to empower marginalized groups - individuals with disabilities, victims of deepfake sexual crimes, and underrepresented identities - and redefine human - machine relationships through critical and inclusive perspectives.

contributors.name: Aida
contributors.bio: Aida is our AI agent helping us 10x the productivity of our development process.
